title: New: Mary Lambert – She Keeps Me Warm
content:
Finally, a version of Same Love / She Keeps Me Warm without the irritating drawl of Macklemore (I jest, I jest, sort of), I mean, ‘When I was in third grade / I thought that I was gay / ‘cus I could draw, my uncle was, and I kept my room straight‘, come on….

In a year when same sex marriage has been such a hotly debated topic, it’s fitting that such a beautifully poignant song should rise above all the political bullshit and outdated religious untruths, reminding us once again, that love is love, and nobody can deny you that. Check out Mary Lambert’s solo version of She Keeps Me Warm below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
